channel.title: Cloud Detection on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Detection on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group

item.title: CloudSEN12
item.description: Introduction CloudSEN12 is a LARGE dataset (~1 TB) for cloud semantic understanding that consists of 49,400 image patches (IP) that are evenly spread throughout all continents except Antarctica. Each IP covers 5090 x 5090 meters and contains data from Sentinel-2 levels 1C and 2A, hand-crafted annotations of thick and thin clouds and cloud shadows, Sentinel-1 Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR), digital elevation model, surface water occurrence, land cover classes, and cloud mask results from six cutting-edge cloud detection algorithms.
